item.title: By: Taipan
item.dc:creator: Taipan
item.description:
Hi. My name is L and I'm an alcoholic. I have an old teaspooon I can bend. It is from an original old 1-Shekel-a-piece-Shuk-Hacarmel-style. Don’t trust me and check for viruses first.
(wtf?)
item.content:encoded:
Hi. My name is L and I’m an alcoholic.
I have an old teaspooon I can bend. It is from an original old 1-Shekel-a-piece-Shuk-Hacarmel-style. Don’t trust me and check for viruses first.

(wtf?)
